reference.title: Setting graceful failover
reference.shortdesc: Graceful failover is initiated via the POST /controller/startGracefulFailover HTTP method and URI.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p: Initiates graceful failover for a specific server node. The server node is specified with the otpNode=[node@hostname] parameter.
section.note: The failover progress can be tracked just like rebalance. After the data is persisted to disk and replicas are up-to-date, the node is put into the failed over state.

section.title: Syntax
section.note: Be sure to update any scripts that implement failover.
